programme.title: Last Ones Out
programme.desc: A skeptical American is stranded in the middle of a zombie-infected Africa and must rely on the help of three mysterious strangers to make it out alive.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: Two hired guns who are commissioned to rescue an imprisoned scientist from a secret facility are hunted down by a terrifying creature of unknown origin.

programme.title: Glorious
programme.desc: A heartbroken man finds himself trapped in a bathroom with a strange voice who says he may be the only hope in stopping a terrible event.

programme.title: Revealer
programme.desc: A stripper and a religious protester are trapped together in a peep show booth and must come together to survive the apocalypse.

programme.title: Scare Package
programme.desc: Seven filmmakers present seven terrifying and comedic tales of horror.

programme.title: Teddy
programme.desc: A young man in a rural town begins to undergo frightening changes after he is scratched by an unknown beast.

programme.title: Almost Human
programme.desc: Seth sees his best friend disappear in a flash of light. Two years later, Seth is still dealing with the fallout and suspicions when a series of grisly murders rocks the community.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.sub-title: Gray Matter; The House of the Head
programme.desc: A man's drinking habit becomes insatiable and his appetite grows to frightening proportions; a severed toy head appears in a girl's dollhouse and starts murdering.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.desc: A platoon of American soldiers finds something more sinister than war behind enemy lines; a man with a passion for found objects finds a growing finger.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.sub-title: All Hallows Eve; The Man in the Suitcase
programme.desc: Teens who go trick-or-treating are met with fear instead of smiles and sweets; Justin brings home the wrong suitcase and is shocked to find a living man stuffed inside.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.sub-title: The Companion; Lydia Layne's Better Half
programme.desc: Harry stumbles upon an old scarecrow and accidentally brings it to life; Lydia kills her lover and needs to hide the evidence, but she gets trapped inside an elevator with the body.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.sub-title: Night of the Paw; Times Is Tough in Musky Holler
programme.desc: A killer gets stranded in a funeral home with a mortician and his monkey paw; a former mayor and his followers who controlled a town through fear and intimidation get a taste of their own medicine.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.sub-title: Skincrawlers; By the Silver Water of Lake Champlain
programme.desc: A doctor discovers a solution for weight loss; Rose believes she has found Champ, the legendary monster of Lake Champlain, but the real monster may still be out there.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.sub-title: Model Kid; Public Television of the Dead
programme.desc: Joe's closest friends are the model toys of his favorite scary movie monsters; a public TV station is overwhelmed when the appraisal of an antique book summons a dark force.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.desc: A marketing ploy at a haunted Bed and Breakfast becomes too realistic; an exterminator gets more than he bargained for when he takes on a big job.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.desc: A misunderstanding in space ensures two astronauts go down in history for all the worst reasons; Lola is convinced her brother is trying to kill her but she's worried about the wrong monster.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.sub-title: Pipe Screams; Within the Walls of Madness
programme.desc: A complicated drain clog; scientists fight to contain the creature they've been studying.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.sub-title: Night of the Living Late Show
programme.desc: Simon has invented an incredible virtual reality experience that allows him to join in on his favorite films but is unprepared for when virtual reality becomes his actual reality.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.desc: A boy mourns the loss of his mother; a couple of teens sneak into a hospital and end up getting a little more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.desc: Bateman blackmails Lampini into letting him take one of the skeletons on exchange for not turning him over to the police; Jackson witnesses a strange creature lurking in the darkness.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.sub-title: The Last Tsuburaya; Okay, I'll Bite
programme.desc: Dr. Mai Sato comes into the possession of a long lost Tsuburaya piece; Elmer Strick is denied parole to stay in the prison's drug ring.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.desc: A siren lures a doctor into her trap to carry out a diabolical plan; a teenage girl must fight off a demonic plague when she realizes her family might be infected.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.sub-title: Time Out; The Things in Oakwood's Past
programme.desc: Tim discovers the key to a strange armoire and is warned time can't be cheated; Reports on the town with a peculiar and morbid history.
